FaqItems.Question: How safe is my master-password?
FaqItems.Answer: Very. Your master-password never even reaches our servers. That's one of the advantages of client-side encryption.

FaqItems.Question: How complicated should my master-password be?
FaqItems.Answer: As complicated as you can make it and still remember it.

FaqItems.Question: What kind of encryption do you use?
FaqItems.Answer: AES Ciphers - which is considered pretty good according to people who understand cryptography way better than I do

FaqItems.Question: How do we trust you(Passman)?
FaqItems.Answer: You don't have to. Here's the source-code: https://github.com/spacetimi/passman_server

FaqItems.Question: Can I contribute?
FaqItems.Answer: Please do. Shoot an email to avi@spacetimi.com

FaqItems.Question: What happens if I forget my master-password?
FaqItems.Answer: Nothing great. You will lose your saved passwords, secrets, and files on Passman. We cannot help you recover your data because, like we said, we literally cannot read your data.
